text:
VidaSystems | Silicon Valley | Part/Full Time | REMOTE

We are about to launch the best online educational 3D content authoring tool. Backed up by top player in education.

We are looking for coders with experience with some or all technologies we use: React.js, react-native, Flexbox, WebGL (or WebGL libraries, or OpenGL), CoffeeScript, Blender scripting, C++, Node.js, PostgreSQL.

Contact: at@vida-systems.com
